name: Parabolic Charge
description: A sweeping electric charge arcs around you, stealing some of the target's energy. Force all creatures in a 60 foot circle, centered on you, to make a CON save against your Move DC, taking 1d10 + MOVE electric damage on a failure. Recover hit points equal to half the total damage dealt, but no more than 5 times your level.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Shows off the Pokemonâ€™s appeal about as well as all the moves before it this turn.
